channel.title: How to change 120/99 to 120/120 without d/cs
channel.description: I'm currently coding a 667 server and have successfully changed the max stat for all skills from 99 to 120 with skaterguys help lol but the level after 99 doesn't change on the secondary part so I fixed that in class134.java but it d/cs my client unless i change it back to 99.

item.title: How to change 120/99 to 120/120 without d/cs
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Like I was saying the entire time when I helped you, just mirror the Dungeoneering skill, but don’t limit it to just Dungeoneering.
Your client/server are built to have 99/99 everything, except dungeoneering. Meaning someone, somewhere, added some form of an exception for it to know dungeoneering could go higher. You have to do the same thing, for all skills.

Can’t be too much of help, as you know, seeing as I don’t know the 667 Server/Client or their structure.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change 120/99 to 120/120 without d/cs
